div.div:
Distinguish the three input types Touch,Pen,Mouse
Each input type has a state. For example:
* Mouse has states: [draw, select]
* pen: [draw, select]
* touch: [pan, draw, select?]

switch.text: Distinguish the three input types Touch,Pen,Mouse...
